Text: A .dll file was missing after install, kept the game from running. If it's not a problem on my end, you might want to look into it.
same problem here, missing d3dx9_43.dll, and on the other torrent as well. please fix this.
After un-raring go to the folder called directx.  Look for the file dxsetup.exe. Double click to install.  When it's complete you should no longer encounter the dll error.
Thanks a lot!! Finished the game in two days in expert mode.
